content.raw:
My intention is to get some notification in the command window when new plugins that are not mentioned in the labconfig file are silently added to it.

Furthermore, plugins that are specified in the labconfig file but not loaded as they are not available \(e.g. when you have a typo in your labconfig file\) are currently silently ignored. However, I am not really satisfied with code lines 104-106 as I expect that there is a better way to code this.?
content.html:
My intention is to get some notification in the command window when new plugins that are not mentioned in the labconfig file are silently added to it.

Furthermore, plugins that are specified in the labconfig file but not loaded as they are not available (e.g. when you have a typo in your labconfig file) are currently silently ignored. However, I am not really satisfied with code lines 104-106 as I expect that there is a better way to code this.?
